actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for annual adjustments in monthly rates of disability compensation and dependency and indemnity compensation according to changes in the Consumer Price Index.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to make annual adjustments in monthly rates of disability compensation and dependency and indemnity compensation according to cost-of-living changes in the Bureau of Labor Statistics Consumer Price Index.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for annual adjustments in monthly rates of disability compensation and dependency and indemnity compensation according to changes in the Consumer Price Index.
